text: Hey guys, I just got a new job as a clown!
speaker: Jake

text: Well, you know me, always the jester!
speaker: Jake

text: Speaking of jobs, I just got promoted to CEO!
speaker: Rachel

text: Thanks Mike, but don't get too excited. I still have to work with you!
speaker: Rachel

text: Hey Jake, why did the scarecrow win an award?
speaker: Mike

text: Because he was outstanding in his field!
speaker: Mike

text: Okay, okay, my turn. Why did the tomato turn red?
speaker: Rachel

text: Because it saw the salad dressing!
speaker: Rachel
